title: Espresso
description: Rich and aromatic single shot of espresso.

description: Creamy cappuccino with a perfect blend of espresso and milk.

description: Smooth and velvety latte with a subtle coffee flavor.

description: Delicious blend of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk.

description: Refreshing and invigorating cold coffee, perfect for warm days.

description: Premium quality coffee beans, ideal for home brewing.

title: Americano

title: Caramel Macchiato

title: Irish Coffee
description: Invigorating blend of coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and cream.
